tuv.seg: <b0>NOTE:</b0> Due to the modular nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> there are certain things that are not included in this user manual, particularly those aspects of setting up and connecting the different devices that can be supported.

<b0>注意：</b0> 由于 the modular nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> there are certain things that are not included in this user manual, particularly those aspects of setting up and connecting the different devices that can be supported.

This document is divided into three parts with the aim of getting you introduced to the interface and basic workings of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through our propriety scripting language <a2>GML</a2> or our visual scripting tool <a3>Drag and Drop</a3>.

这个文档分成了三个部分，以便更好的给你介绍 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的界面和基础工作。 before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through our propriety scripting language <a2>GML</a2> or our visual scripting tool <a3>Drag and Drop</a3>.
Welcome to the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> user manual!
